documents.document: The Best Hotel My partner and I stay at Dreams Resort, Punta cana . We had a lot of fun. The hotel was Beautiful. The staff was very nice. We stay in a honeymoon suite. This hotel deserve five stars. They also very gay friendly. dont be scared ; enjoy yourself and have fun.The pool was clean and bigThe food was excellent ; but small portion ( order 2 plates)rooms are beautifulThe night life was also great and funny.I recommend the honeymoon suite.Dreams Rocks!Papi Bebo
